articles.title: Are fans being turned off multi-club ownership model?
articles.summary: Strasbourg fans thought they had it good from being aligned with Chelsea. Then manager Liam Rosenior walked out mid-season to take charge of the Blues.

articles.title: Watch every angle of Gordon's save of the season contender
articles.summary: Watch Hearts goalkeeper Craig Gordon's impressive late save in his side's 1-0 win at Dundee from different angles.

articles.title: FREE STREAM: Good Morning Transfers
Maye leads Patriots past Chargers to claim first playoff win
articles.summary: Drake Maye threw a touchdown pass to Hunter Henry in the fourth quarter as the New England Patriots defense roughed up Justin Herbert in a 16-3 AFC Wild Card playoff victory over the Los Angeles Charg...

articles.title: Goals, shocks and fan power on a record-breaking FA Cup weekend
articles.summary: If anyone needed convincing that the FA Cup still matters, this season's record-breaking third round provided all the necessary evidence.

articles.title: 'Fragile' Man Utd set for fewest games in season since 1914-15
articles.summary: Manchester United will prepare for next Saturday's game with Manchester City with no manager in place to lift their "fragile" confidence.

articles.title: 'Big personality' Martinelli goes from 'idiot' to hat-trick hero
articles.summary: Gabriel Martinelli was branded an "idiot" a few days ago - but showed great personality to respond with an FA Cup hat-trick, according to Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta.

articles.title: 'Clean sheet mentality' key in Rohl's Rangers revival
articles.summary: Another win and another clean sheet for Rangers as they stay on the coattails of Scottish Premiership leaders Hearts, with manager Danny Rohl hailing the team's "outstanding development".

articles.title: Arsenal beat Portsmouth thanks to Martinelli hat-trick
articles.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scores the first hat-trick of his senior career as an Arsenal side showing 10 changes come from a goal down to beat Championship side Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

articles.title: Castellanos scores in extra time as West Ham edge past QPR
articles.summary: Valentin 'Taty' Castellanos scores his first goal for West Ham United as they beat Queens Park Rangers in extra time and progress to the fourth round of the FA Cup.

articles.title: Man City beat Everton at home to strengthen grip on WSL title
articles.summary: Manchester City consolidate their place at the top of the Women's Super League table with a convincing win over Everton.

articles.title: Are 'efficient' Chelsea ready to chase down titles?
articles.summary: Having won the last six Women's Super League titles, Chelsea have not had to chase for a while. But they are up for the challenge this time.

articles.title: Daly and Hanson spark Villa comeback against Brighton
articles.summary: Aston Villa score twice in two second-half minutes as they come from behind to beat Brighton in the Women's Super League.

articles.title: Arsenal set pieces punish Portsmouth in FA Cup third round
articles.summary: Match of the Day pundits Dion Dublin and Phil Jones look at how Portsmouth were punished by Arsenal's set pieces as the Gunners secure comfortable 4-1 win to progress to the fourth round of the FA Cup...

articles.title: Chelsea kick off new year by thrashing West Ham
articles.summary: Chelsea begin the new year with an impressive victory over West Ham in visiting manager Rita Guarino's first match in the Women's Super League.

highlights.title: Premier League highlights this week - Week Highlights

articles.title: Watch best of Saturday's weather-affected SPFL action
articles.summary: Watch the best of the action from Saturday's weather-affected Scottish Championship, League 1 and League 2 programme.

articles.title: Leeds avoid upset with second-half comeback against Derby
articles.summary: James Justin scored his first goal for Leeds United since joining from Leicester City in the summer, in a second-half comeback after Derby County took the lead thanks to a Ben Brereton Diaz strike.

articles.title: West Brom fight back to beat Swansea on penalties
articles.summary: Managerless West Bromwich Albion end a run of 10 successive away defeats as they come from behind to win their FA Cup third-round tie at Championship rivals Swansea City on penalties.

articles.title: Mansfield stun Sheff Utd as Norwich, West Brom, Hull advance in FA Cup
articles.summary: Two goals from Louis Reed against his former club helped Mansfield to a shock 4-3 victory at Sheffield United in the FA Cup.

articles.title: Second-half turnaround helps Leeds overcome Derby in FA Cup
articles.summary: Two goals in four second-half minutes helped a much-changed Leeds United come from behind to beat Derby County 3-1 at Pride Park to book their place in the FA Cup fourth round.

highlights.title: Championship highlights this week - Week Highlights
League One highlights this week - Week Highlights

articles.title: Two for Reed as Mansfield upset Sheff Utd in thriller
articles.summary: Mansfield Town cause one of the shocks of the FA Cup third round with a stunning victory over Sheffield United in a seven-goal thriller at Bramall Lane.
